letters.description: Comprehensive evaluation of the client's current gut health status, including diet, lifestyle, medical history, and symptoms.
Implementing personalized strategies to improve sleep, stress management, and physical activity to support gut health.
Developing a customized dietary plan focusing on nutrient-dense foods, prebiotics, probiotics, and addressing food sensitivities to nourish the gut microbiome.
Introducing targeted interventions, such as specific supplements or gut-healing protocols, to address imbalances and promote microbiome diversity.
Creating a sustainable long-term plan to maintain gut health through ongoing monitoring, adjustments, and continued education.
